home.addNav.title: Adding Navigation
home.addNav.body:
You can add new navigation items to the main menu on the left by modifying the appropriate file in /src/modules/setup/app. An Example for the Slack item in "Platform Tools":

{
	name: 'slack',
	label: 'Sales Cloud for Slack',
	disabled: false,
	expanded: false,
	pageReference: {
		type: 'namedPage',
		attributes: {
			pageName: 'Slack',
		},
		state: {},
	},
}
